# offerDetailText

**Instance Property**

The user-readable text containing the details of the offer.

## Declaration

```swift
var offerDetailText: String { get set }
```

## Discussion

Use this property to explain a special offer in more detail.

## Accessing the Offer Details

- **offerTitleText**: The user-readable text that summarizes the offer.
- **offerIdentifier**: The unique identifier associated with the offer.
